verbs.description: Rep. Ron DeSantis , one of Donald Trump ’s most loyal lieutenants in the war on the Mueller investigation and a GOP gubernatorial candidate in Florida , [V: is] getting millions of dollars worth of friendly exposure on Fox News .

[ARG0: Rep. Ron DeSantis , one of Donald Trump ’s most loyal lieutenants in the war on the Mueller investigation and a GOP gubernatorial candidate in Florida ,] is [V: getting] [ARG1: millions of dollars worth of friendly exposure] [ARGM-LOC: on Fox News] .
